Title: External electrical and pharmacological cardioversion for atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter or atrial tachycardias: A network meta-analysis
Abstract: Copyright © 2019 The Cochrane Collaboration. Published by John Wiley and Sons, Ltd.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To assess the efficacy and safety of pharmacological and electrical cardioversion for atrial fibrillation (AF).
